import React, { useState } from 'react' // useState로만 해보기 function SubmitForm() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [price, sePrice] = useState(0); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [getDate, setGetDate] = useState(); const [isMemo, setIsMemo] = useState(false); const [newForm, setNewForm] = useState({ id: new Date(), name: 'name', price: 'price', category: 'category', date: 'date', memo: 'memo', repurchase: true, }) return (
setIsMemo(!isMemo)}/> {/* 메모 작성 버튼을 눌렀을 때만 보이도록 */} { isMemo && }
) } export default SubmitForm
